sentence.text: Here, we sought to cellular response to interleukin-4 lncRNAs differentially regulated in cancer cells resistant to either negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-related apoptosis-inducing ligand (TRAIL) or the Mcl-1 inhibitor UMI-77, agents that coenzyme A biosynthetic process through the extrinsic and intrinsic apoptotic pathways, respectively.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
